# This file is a part of gr-torchdsp

#

# #######################################################################
# Setup library
# #######################################################################
include(GrPlatform) # define LIB_SUFFIX
list(APPEND torchdsp_sources
    shm_utils.cc
    triton_fir_filter_ff_impl.cc
    triton_model_impl.cc
    triton_block_impl.cc
    phased_array_impl.cc
    quantize_impl.cc
)

set(torchdsp_sources "${torchdsp_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)

if(NOT torchdsp_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT torchdsp_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-torchdsp SHARED ${torchdsp_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-torchdsp gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime TritonClient::httpclient "${RapidJSON_LIBRARIES}")
target_include_directories(gnuradio-torchdsp
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
)
set_target_properties(gnuradio-torchdsp PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_torchdsp_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-torchdsp PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

# #######################################################################
# Install built library files
# #######################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-torchdsp)

# #######################################################################
# Print summary
# #######################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

# #######################################################################
# Build and register unit test
# #######################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
# include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_torchdsp_sources
)

# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-torchdsp)

if(NOT test_torchdsp_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_torchdsp_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_torchdsp_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("torchdsp_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
